items.content:
US consumer confidence is flashing red:

The US Consumer Confidence index dropped -3.8 points in December, to 89.1, the lowest since April.

This marks the 5th consecutive monthly decline.

Excluding April, the index is now at the lowest level since January 2021.

The Present

items.content:
A growing pile of evidence suggests the $64,000 question so to speak may be "Will Tomahawk missiles, which reportedly use 500 oz. of silver per missile, still work just as well if they use silver futures contracts instead?"

Ditto batteries, drones, datacenters, etc.

items.content:
An ounce of silver is now worth ~40% more than a barrel of oil, a historically rare imbalance.

And, if 1% interest rates are truly coming, 2026 will be historic.

In the below post, we break down our call for record highs in precious metals and why it finally happened.

Silver prices are now up a MASSIVE +175% in 2025 and set to post an 8-month win streak for first time since 1980.

What is happening? Let us explain.

(a thread)

But that's exactly what happened in the previous rallies.

items.content:
Major capital is positioning aggressively 

At 3:52 pm yesterday, a buyer put $429 million into call options on the Silver Miners ETF $SILJ, expiring January–February 2026.

This is a massive directional bet on higher Silver miner prices.
